page.title: 15Garden Centres. Rotherham.
page.content: Ramsbottoms Nurseries grow hundreds of sorts of plants including a selection of bedding plants. The most expensive of these is the standard rose tree at Â£6.00 each. The bedding plants start at 4p upwards. The nursery itself covers an area of approximate 4 acres and in that space are glasshouses and three plastic tunnels. There are 4 people working at the nusery. It opens at dawn(7:00am)and closes at dusk(9:00pm. They use around 1 ton of fertiliser per year and much more manure. They also have 6 goats (for milk) 50-60 poultry birds (for eggs) 6 guard dogs, 1 cat and 3 kittens to keep out rats and mice.
